requirements_list.description: Implement procedures for encrypting sensitive documents, such as Delivery Notes, Requisition identifiers, Waybills, and Transport Orders.

requirements_list.name: Protected Data Storage
requirements_list.description: Establish a comprehensive key management system to generate and protect cryptographic keys for accessing and securing data stored in the Requisitions Data Store, Production Plan Data Store, Purchase Order and Transport Order Data Stores, Finished Car Registry, and Warehouse Inventory.

requirements_list.name: Factory IT Infrastructure Key Management
requirements_list.description: Establish a comprehensive key management system to generate, protect, and recover cryptographic keys used to secure the Factory's IT infrastructure.

requirements_list.name: System Admin Key Management Responsibilities
requirements_list.description: Assign the System admin role the responsibility for implementing and managing the key management system.

requirements_list.name: Security Manager Key Management Oversight
requirements_list.description: Assign the Security manager role the responsibility for overseeing the security procedures related to key management.
